plt.hlines(y = result17['top'], xmax = 0, xmin = result17['2021'], linewidth = 1, alpha = 1, color=['#8692bf'])

plt.scatter( y=result17['top'], x=result17['2021'], alpha =0.7, marker='*', color='#ffab40',label="2021" )
plt.legend( loc='lower right')
plt.grid(axis='x',lw = 0.25)
